title: Oxford Particle Physics RG2009 supplement 2011/12
abstractText: Research in Particle Physics experiments (see Rolling Grant 2009).
impactText: World-class research including measuring Higgs properties, CP-violation and neutrino mixing measurements leads to world knowledge. Research and Development for current and future experiments have applications in Information technology (GRID computing), medical physics (LHCb and TORCH), sensor and lightweight structures development (ATLAS) and national security (MARS project).
findingsText: World-class research including measuring Higgs properties, CP-violation and neutrino mixing measurements. Research and Development for current and future experiments. Scientific knowledge for mankind. Research and Development on silicon and industrial applications. Aerospace, Defence and Marine,Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software),Education,Electronics,Energy,Environment,Healthcare,Manufacturing, including Industrial Biotechology,Security and Diplomacy
